chunk:
Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

Brand: Brickell Men's Products

Category: Serums & Essences
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

chunk: Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Acetyl Octapeptide-3, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Glycerin, Sodium PCA, Teareth-20, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Chrysin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Honeysuckle (Lonicera japonica) Extract, Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate), Citric Acid.
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

chunk:
Directions: Use the booster after cleansing your face with our Purifying Charcoal Face Wash for Men or Clarifying Gel Face Wash for Men.

You can apply it one of two ways:
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

chunk:
You can apply it one of two ways:

1. Mix the booster with our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Daily Defense Face Moisturizer, Resurfacing Anti Aging Cream or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream and apply directly to your face and neck, using about 6-8 drops of the booster per ounce of the cream you are mixing it with.
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

chunk: 2. Alternatively, you can apply a pea size amount (1-2 drops) of the booster directly onto your entire face. Make sure to cover the entire face down into the neck. Follow with a light application of our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream.
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men

chunk: Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1744-Brickell Men's Products, Protein Peptides Booster for Men
